title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally on macOS and Linux with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published on npm as ‘ollama’. Provides a thin wrapper around the Ollama REST API for Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI. Offers synchronous and asynchronous APIs to chat, generate, pull, and manage models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web UI for Ollama (similar to ChatGPT interface) with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, published to Maven Central. Provides fluent builders for chat, generate, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with additional helpers for bulk model pulls and configuration templating.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset that lets pipelines use Ollama models for generative QA and summarization without external API calls.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot example combining Ollama, ChromaDB, and Sentence-Transformers for fully local question-answering over PDFs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official CUDA-enabled container image (ollama/ollama:cuda) allowing GPU-accelerated inference on Linux with NVIDIA runtime.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord bot that exposes Ollama models in chat channels with per-user rate limits and model hot-swapping via slash commands.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Unofficial Elixir client (Hex package ‘ollama’) offering GenServer-backed connection pooling and streaming completions.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers for the Ollama API with serde types and tokio streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by Ollama for summarizing notes and brainstorming ideas.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Bolt JS that threads Ollama responses and supports model selection via emoji reactions.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-dependent code without cloud APIs.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Another Rust client focused on ergonomic builders and native-tls, published as ‘ollama-rust’ on crates.io.

title: ollama-nextjs-template
summary: Starter template combining Next.js 14 App Router, TypeScript, and ollama-js for building local-first AI web apps.
